Text: Why upload an old episode when the new one for this Sunday is out? Episode 2 was last week, same with episode 1. Both came out same time

hype7 - No, it didn't air last week - it first aired last night (Mar 10th).  History Channel is airing new episodes on Sunday (although the next episode can be watched on their website).

My DVR recorded it yesterday as a new episode and both the History Channel site http://www.history.com/shows/vikings/episodes and TVRage list it as the 10th.

Not sure where you got your info from...
